number spentBudget: number } export function StepPartsManagement({ projectId, stepId, onSave }: PartsManagementProps) { const [partsData, setPartsData] = useState({ parts: [], totalBudget: 0, spentBudget: 0 }) const [newPart, setNewPart] = useState>({ name: '', category: 'electronic', quantity: 1, price: 0, shop: '', url: '', notes: '' }) const [filterCategory, setFilterCategory] = useState('all') const [showOnlyUnpurchased, setShowOnlyUnpurchased] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { const saved = localStorage.getItem(`parts-${projectId}-${stepId}`) if (saved) { const data = JSON.parse(saved) setPartsData(data) calculateSpentBudget(data.parts) } }, [projectId, stepId]) const saveData = (data: PartsData) => { setPartsData(data) localStorage.setItem(`parts-${projectId}-${stepId}`, JSON.stringify(data)) onSave(data) } const calculateSpentBudget = (parts: Part[]) => { const spent = parts .filter(p => p.purchased) .reduce((sum, p) => sum + (p.price * p.quantity), 0) setPartsData(prev => ({ ...prev, spentBudget: spent })) } const addPart = () => { if (!newPart.name?.trim()) return const part: Part = { id: Date.now().toString(), name: newPart.name!, category: newPart.category as Part['category'], quantity: newPart.quantity || 1, price: newPart.price || 0, shop: newPart.shop || '', url: newPart.url || '', purchased: false, notes: newPart.notes || '' } const updated = { ...partsData, parts: [...partsData.parts, part] } saveData(updated) setNewPart({ name: '', category: 'electronic', quantity: 1, price: 0, shop: '', url: '', notes: '' }) } const togglePurchased = (partId: string) => { const updated = { ...partsData, parts: partsData.parts.map(p => p.id === partId ? { ...p, purchased: !p.purchased } : p ) } calculateSpentBudget(updated.parts) saveData(updated) } const deletePart = (partId: string) => { const updated = { ...partsData, parts: partsData.parts.filter(p => p.id !== partId) } calculateSpentBudget(updated.parts) saveData(updated) } const updatePart = (partId: string, field: keyof Part, value: any) => { const updated = { ...partsData, parts: partsData.parts.map(p => p.id === partId ? { ...p, [field]: value } : p ) } if (field === 'price' || field === 'quantity') { calculateSpentBudget(updated.parts) } saveData(updated) } const getCategoryIcon = (category: case 'tool': return 'text-green-400' default: return 'text-purple-400' } } const filteredParts = partsData.parts.filter(part => { if (filterCategory !== 'all' && part.category !== filterCategory) return false if (showOnlyUnpurchased && part.purchased) return false return true }) const categoryStats = { electronic: partsData.parts.filter(p => p.category === 'electronic').length, mechanical: 'tool').length, other: partsData.parts.filter(p => p.category === 'other').length } const totalCost = partsData.parts.reduce((sum, p) => sum + (p.price * p.quantity), 0) const purchasedCount =
